about_the_game:
Apollo 11 Moon Landing - TimeLab DLC


Experience the first moon landing with Apollo 11 as you walk on the lunar surface and witness the breathtaking touchdown of the lunar module on July 20, 1969.

Features:

  • Immersive Simulation: Relive the iconic moments of the Apollo 11 moon landing and mission on the lunar surface in stunning perspectives. Discover fascinating facts and technical details.
  • Explore the Lunar Surface: Discover the lunar landscape and investigate the artifacts left behind by the astronauts.
  • Historical Insights: Dive into the history of space exploration and gain a deep understanding of its evolution from its early beginnings, through the moon landing, to the present day.
  • Additional Game "Lunar Lander": Test your skills and enjoy additional fun with a small entertaining game.

Immerse yourself in the history of space exploration and experience the majestic moments of the Apollo 11 mission. This unique experience is perfect for history buffs and space enthusiasts.

Now available on Steam!

Please note: This DLC is executable with our VR platform "TimeLab" also available on Steam
detailed_description:
Apollo 11 Moon Landing - TimeLab DLC


Experience the first moon landing with Apollo 11 as you walk on the lunar surface and witness the breathtaking touchdown of the lunar module on July 20, 1969.

Features:

  • Immersive Simulation: Relive the iconic moments of the Apollo 11 moon landing and mission on the lunar surface in stunning perspectives. Discover fascinating facts and technical details.
  • Explore the Lunar Surface: Discover the lunar landscape and investigate the artifacts left behind by the astronauts.
  • Historical Insights: Dive into the history of space exploration and gain a deep understanding of its evolution from its early beginnings, through the moon landing, to the present day.
  • Additional Game "Lunar Lander": Test your skills and enjoy additional fun with a small entertaining game.

Immerse yourself in the history of space exploration and experience the majestic moments of the Apollo 11 mission. This unique experience is perfect for history buffs and space enthusiasts.

Now available on Steam!

Please note: This DLC is executable with our VR platform "TimeLab" also available on Steam
name: TimeLab: Apollo 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR compatible headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR compatible headsets

short_description: Experience the first moon landing with Apollo 11 as you walk on the lunar surface and witness the breathtaking touchdown of the lunar module on July 20, 1969.
